snippet: This holiday week, City Room is digging up stories from The New York Times archives that tell tales of city summers. Today’s story is from an author complaining about women fanning themselves in church.
abstract: This holiday week, City Room is digging up stories from The New York Times archives that tell tales of city summers. Today’s story is from an author complaining about women fanning themselves in church.

headline.main: New York Summer Stories: The Ladies and Their Fans
